title: Neon Swing
description: Neon Swing is an arcade game where you must swing as fast as you can to avoid the red wall which is slowly moving toward you. Swing from point to point and try to get as far as you can while using trampolins to get even further. The trampolins in your way can also make your life a bit more difficult, so use them to your advantage. Make clever use of the game mechanics and be the best neon swing player out there!
